file.name: mp_delivery.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /proximity-integration/v1/orders/{shipment_id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Get order by shipment ID
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Get order by shipment ID
        spa: Consultar pedido por ID
        por: Consultar pedido por ID
      description: Retrieve the information of an order by its shipment ID
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Retrieve the information of an order by its shipment ID
        spa: Consulta las informaciones de un pedido por su shipment ID
        por: Consulta as informações de um pedido através do shipment ID
      parameters:
        - name: shipment_id
          in: path
          description: Shipment ID of the order.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Shipment ID of the order.
            spa: Shipment ID del pedido.
            por: Shipment ID do pedido.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example:  41034141533
        - name: x-time-zone
          in: header
          description: Timezone of the times shown on the JSON.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Timezone of the times shown on the JSON.
            spa: Zona horaria de las horas que se muestran en el JSON.
            por: Fuso horário dos horários mostrados no JSON.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: "GMT-3"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:          
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: string
                    example: "41034141533"
                    description: Shipment ID of the order.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Shipment ID of the order.
                      spa: Shipment ID del pedido.
                      por: Shipment ID do pedido.
                  type:
                    type: string
                    example: "DELIVERY"
                    description: This field refers to the way in which the order will be delivered.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: This field refers to the way in which the order will be delivered.
                      spa: Este campo hace referencia a la forma en que se entregará el pedido.
                      por: Esse campo faz referência sobre a forma de como será entregue o pedido.
                    enum:
                      - DELIVERY -- the restaurant will be responsible for delivering the order.
                      - TAKEOUT -- the buyer will pick up the order from the restaurant.
                  displayId:
                    type: string
                    example: "9129"
                    description: Order Id shown in the Ordering Application interface for the Buyer.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Order Id shown in the Ordering Application interface for the Buyer.
                      spa: ID de pedido que se muestra en la interfaz de la aplicación de pedidos para el comprador.
                      por: ID de pedido que aparece na interface da aplicação de pedidos para o comprador.
                  createdAt:
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-02-16T21:20:15.227Z"
                    description: Order creation time.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Order creation time.
                      spa: Hora de creación del pedido.
                      por: Hora de criação do pedido.
                  orderTiming:
                    type: string
                    example: "INSTANT"
                    description: Scheduled time to start preparing an order. By now, only the start immediately is implemented, and the value of this field will always be INSTANT.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Scheduled time to start preparing an order. By now, only the start immediately is implemented, and the value of this field will always be INSTANT.
                      spa: Hora prevista para empezar a preparar un pedido. Por ahora, solo se implementa el inicio inmediato, y el valor de este campo siempre será INSTANT.
                      por: Hora agendada para começar a preparar um pedido. Até agora, apenas o início imediato está implementado, e o valor deste campo será sempre INSTANT.
                  preparationStartDateTime: 
                    type: string
                    example: "2022-02-16T21:20:47.755Z"
                    description: Value referring to the start of preparation of an order. For now, the value contained in this field will be the time when the order changed its state to ready_to_ship/ready_to_print.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Value referring to the start of preparation of an order. For now, the value contained in this field will be the time when the order changed its state to ready_to_ship/ready_to_print.
                      spa: Valor referente al inicio de preparación de un pedido. Por ahora, el valor contenido en este campo será el momento en que el pedido cambió su estado a ready_to_ship/ready_to_print.
                      por: Valor referente ao início da preparação de um pedido. Por enquanto, o valor contido neste campo será o momento em que o pedido mudou seu estado para ready_to_ship/ready_to_print.
                  merchant:
                    type: object
                    description: Informations about the seller.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Informations about the seller.
                      spa: Informaciones sobre el seller.
                      por: Informações sobre o seller.
                    properties:
                      id: 
                        type: string
                        example: "1070421029"
                        description: User ID of the restaurant account linked to Mercado Pago.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: User ID of the restaurant account linked to Mercado Pago.
                          spa: ID de usuario de la cuenta del restaurante vinculada a Mercado Pago.
                          por: ID de usuário da conta do restaurante vinculada ao Mercado Pago.
                      name: 
                        type: string
                        example: Doc's Store
                        description: Name of the restaurant.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Name of the restaurant.
                          spa: Nombre del restaurante.
                          por: Nome do restaurante.
                  items:
                    type: array
                    description: Array of objects that contain the item information for an order.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Array of objects that contain the item information for an order.
                      spa: Array de objetos que contienen la información del item para un pedido.
                      por: Array de objetos que contêm as informações do item para um pedido.
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id: 
                          type: string
                          example: "MLA1122759502"
                          description: ID of the item.
                        name:
                          type: string
                          example: "Burrito Combo Refrigerante"
                          description: Name of the item.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Name of the item.
                            spa: Nombre del item.
                            por: Nome do item.
                        externalCode:
                          type: string
                          example: "1215451"
                          description: External code for an item which can be used by point of sale.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: External code for an item which can be used by point of sale.
                            spa: Código externo de un artículo que puede ser utilizado por punto de venta.
                            por: Código externo para um item que pode ser usado pelo ponto de venda.
                        unit: 
                          type: string
                          example: "UNIT"
                          description: Measure unit of the item. By now, only the UNIT value is available.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Measure unit of the item. By now, only the UNIT value is available.
                            spa: Unidad de medida del item. Por ahora, solo el valor UNIT está disponible.
                            por: Unidade de medida do item. Até agora, apenas o valor UNIT está disponível.
                        quantity:
                          type: number
                          example: 2
                          description: The quantity of the item.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: The quantity of the item.
                            spa: La cantidad del item.
                            por: Quantidade do item.
                        specialInstructions:
                          type: string
                          example: "No quiero cebolla."
                          description: Comment about the ordered item inserted by the buyer.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Comment about the ordered item inserted by the buyer.
                            spa: Comentario sobre el item pedido insertado por el comprador.
                            por: Comentário sobre o item pedido inserido pelo comprador.
                        options:
                          type: array
                          description: Field referring to the complements of an item. If the ordered item has no complements, this field will be empty.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Field referring to the complements of an item. If the ordered item has no complements, this field will be empty.
                            spa: Campo referente a los complementos de un item. Si el item pedido no tiene complementos, este campo estará vacío.
                            por: Campo referente aos complementos de um item. Se o item pedido não tiver complementos, este campo ficará vazio.
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              id:
                                type: string
                                example: "MLA1122707065"
                                description: ID of the complement item.
                                x-description-i18n:
                                  eng: ID of the complement item.
                                  spa: ID del item del complemento.
                                  por: ID do item complementar.
                              name: 
                                type: string
                                example: "Soda"
                                description: Name of the complement item.
                                x-description-i18n:
                                  eng: Name of the complement item.
                                  spa: Nombre del item del complemento.
                                  por: Nome do item complementar.
                              externalCode:
                                type: string
                                example: "151545"
                                description: External code for a complement item which can be used by a point of sale.
                                x-description-i18n:
                                  eng: External code for a complement item which can be used by a point of sale.
                                  spa: Código externo del item de complemento que puede ser utilizado por un punto de venta.
                                  por: Código externo para um item complementar que pode ser usado por um ponto de venda.
                              unit:
                                type: string
                                example: "UNIT"
                                description: Measure unit of the complement item. By now, only the UNIT value is available.
                                x-description-i18n:
                                  eng: Measure unit of the complement item. By now, only the UNIT value is available.
                                  spa: Unidad de medida del item del complemento. Por ahora, solo el valor UNIT está disponible.
                                  por: Unidade de medida do item complementar. Até agora, apenas o valor UNIT está disponível.
                              quantity:
                                type: number
                                example: 2
                                description: The quantity of the complement item.
                                x-description-i18n:
                                  eng: The quantity of the complement item.
                                  spa: La cantidad del item complementario.
                                  por: A quantidade do item complementar.
                              unitPrice:
                                type: object
                                description: Unit price of a complement item.
                                x-description-i18n:
                                  eng: Unit price of a complement item.
                                  spa: Precio unitario de un item de complemento.
                                  por: Preço unitário de um item complementar.
                                properties:
                                  value:
                                    type: number
                                    example: 100.0
                                    description: Unit price of a complement item.
                                    x-description-i18n:
                                      eng: Unit price of a complement item.
                                      spa: Precio unitario de un item de complemento.
                                      por: Preço unitário de um item complementar.
                                  currency:
                                    type: string
                                    example: "ARS"
                                    description: Currency related to price.
                                    x-description-i18n:
                                      eng: Unit price of a complement item.
                                      spa: Moneda relacionada con el precio.
                                      por: Moeda relacionada ao preço.
                              totalPrice:
                                type: object
                                description: The total price of a complement item.
                                x-description-i18n:
                                  eng: The total price of a complement item.
                                  spa: El precio total de un item de complemento.
                                  por: O preço total de um item complementar.
                                properties: 
                                  value: 
                                    type: number
                                    example: 200.0
                                    description: The total price of a complement item (unitPrice * quantity).
                                    x-description-i18n:
                                      eng: The total price of a complement item (unitPrice * quantity).
                                      spa: El precio total de un artículo de complemento (unitPrice * quantity).
                                      por: O preço total de um item complementar (unitPrice * quantity).
                                  currency:
                                    type: string
                                    example: "ARS"
                                    description: Currency related to price.
                                    x-description-i18n:
                                      eng: Currency related to price.
                                      spa: Moneda relacionada con el precio.
                                      por: Moeda relacionada ao preço.
                              extension:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                  group: 
                                    type: string
                                    example: "Combo with soda"
                                    description: Name of the group that the complement item selected belongs to.
                                    x-description-i18n:
                                      eng: Name of the group that the complement item selected belongs to.
                                      spa: Nombre del grupo al que pertenece el complemento seleccionado.
                                      por: Nome do grupo ao qual pertence o item de complemento selecionado.
                        unitPrice:
                          type: object
                          description: Unit price of the selected item.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Unit price of the selected item.
                            spa: Precio unitario del item seleccionado.
                            por: Preço unitário do item selecionado.
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 300.0
                              description: Unit price of the selected item.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Unit price of the selected item.
                                spa: Precio unitario del item seleccionado.
                                por: Preço unitário do item selecionado.
                            currency: 
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to price.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Currency related to price.
                                spa: Moneda relacionada con el precio.
                                por: Moeda relacionada ao preço.
                        optionsPrice:
                          type: object
                          description: Sum of the prices of the complements of an item.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Sum of the prices of the complements of an item.
                            spa: Suma de los precios de los complementos de un item.
                            por: Soma dos preços dos complementos de um item.
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 200.0
                              description: Sum of the prices of the complements of an item.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Sum of the prices of the complements of an item.
                                spa: Suma de los precios de los complementos de un item.
                                por: Soma dos preços dos complementos de um item.
                            currency: 
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to price.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Currency related to price.
                                spa: Moneda relacionada con el precio.
                                por: Moeda relacionada ao preço.
                        totalPrice:
                          type: object
                          description: Total price of an item, considering its quantity and complements.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Total price of an item, considering its quantity and complements.
                            spa: Precio total de un item, considerando su cantidad y complementos.
                            por: Preço total de um item, considerando sua quantidade e complementos.
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 1000.0
                              description: Total price of an item, considering its quantity and complements ((unityPrice + optionsPrice) * quantity).
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Total price of an item, considering its quantity and complements ((unityPrice + optionsPrice) * quantity).
                                spa: Precio total de un item, considerando su cantidad y complementos ((unityPrice + optionsPrice) * quantity).
                                por: Precio total de un artículo, considerando su cantidad y complementos ((unityPrice + optionsPrice) * quantity).
                            currency: 
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to price.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Currency related to price.
                                spa: Moneda relacionada con el precio.
                                por: Moeda relacionada ao preço.
                        extension:
                          type: object
                          description: Additional information about the item
                          properties:
                            unitNetPrice:
                              type: object
                              description: In case of the product have a discount, this field will show the information of the value of the product with the applied discount
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: In case of the product have a discount, this field will show the information of the value of the product with the applied discount
                                spa: En caso de que el producto tenga descuento, este campo mostrará la información del valor del producto con el descuento aplicado.
                                por: Caso o produto tenha desconto, este campo mostrará a informação do valor do produto com o desconto aplicado.
                              properties:
                                value:
                                  type: number
                                  example: 1000.0
                                  description: Value of the product with discount.
                                  x-description-i18n:
                                    eng: Value of the product with discount.
                                    spa: Valor del producto con descuento.
                                    por: Valor do produto com desconto.
                                currency:
                                  type: string
                                  example: "ARS"
                                  description: Currency related to price.
                                  x-description-i18n:
                                    eng: Currency related to price.
                                    spa: Moneda relacionada con el precio.
                                    por: Moeda relacionada ao preço.
                  otherFees:
                    type: array
                    description: Array of objects with amounts of fees charged by the order. Fees like shipping and operation of the marketplace are included.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Array of objects with amounts of fees charged by the order. Fees like shipping and operation of the marketplace are included.
                      spa: Array de objetos con montos de tarifas cobradas por el pedido. Se incluyen tarifas como el envío y el tarifas del marketplace.
                      por: Array de objetos com valores de taxas cobradas pelo pedido. Taxas como frete e operação do marketplace estão incluídas.
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        name:
                          type: string
                          example: "Name of the Fee"
                          description: Name of the Fee.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Name of the fee.
                            spa: Nombre de la tarifa.
                            por: Nome da taxa.
                        type:
                          type: string
                          example: "DELIVERY_FEE"
                          description: Field that specifies the type of the fee. 
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Field that specifies the type of the fee.
                            spa: Campo que especifica el tipo de tarifa.
                            por: Campo que especifica o tipo de taxa.
                          enum: 
                            - DELIVERY_FEE -- fee charged for shipping the product.
                            - SERVICE_FEE -- fee for the using of Marketplace
                            - TIP -- Value of the tip.
                        receivedBy:
                          type: string
                          example: "MERCHANT"
                          description: Field that specifies who will receive the fee amount. 
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Field that specifies who will receive the fee amount.
                            spa: Campo que especifica quién recibirá el monto de la tarifa.
                            por: Campo que especifica quem receberá o valor da taxa.
                          enum: 
                            - MERCHANT -- the fee amount that will be received by the merchant.
                            - MARKETPLACE -- the fee amount that will be received by the marketplace.
                            - LOGISTIC_SERVICES -- the fee amount that will be received by the Service of Logistic.
                        receiverDocument:
                          type: string
                          example: "3124123141"
                          description: Document of the amount fee receiver.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Document of receiver of the fee amount.
                            spa: Documento del receptor del importe de la tarifa.
                            por: Documento do destinatário do valor da taxa.
                        price: 
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 119.0
                              description: Price of the fee.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Price of the fee.
                                spa: Precio de la tarifa.
                                por: Preço da taxa.
                            currency:
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to price. 
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Currency related to price. 
                                spa: Moneda relacionada con el precio.
                                por: Moeda relacionada com o preço.
                  discounts:
                    type: array
                    description: Information about the discounts that can be applied on cart, items or on delivery fee.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Information about the discounts that can be applied on cart, items or on delivery fee.
                      spa: Información sobre los descuentos que se pueden aplicar en carrito, artículos o en gastos de envío.
                      por: Informações sobre os descontos que podem ser aplicados no carrinho, itens ou na taxa de entrega.
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        amount: 
                          type: object
                          properties:
                            value:
                              type: number
                              example: 119.0
                              description: Value of discount.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Value of discount.
                                spa: Valor de descuento.
                                por: Valor do desconto.
                            currency:
                              type: string
                              example: "ARS"
                              description: Currency related to value.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: Currency related to price. 
                                spa: Moneda relacionada con el precio.
                                por: Moeda relacionada com o preço.
                        target:
                          type: string
                          example: "ITEM"
                          description: Where the discount will be applied. 
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Where the discount will be applied. 
                            spa: Donde se aplicará el descuento.
                            por: Onde o desconto será aplicado.
                          enum: 
                            - CART -- The discount wil be applied on the cart.
                            - DELIVERY_FEE -- The discount will be applied on the delivery fee.
                            - ITEM -- The discount will be applien on an Item
                        targetId:
                          type: string
                          example: "MLA1122759502"
                          description: If the target of the discount is an Item, this field will show the ID of the Item that the discount has been applied.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: If the target of the discount is an Item, this field will show the ID of the Item that the discount has been applied.
                            spa: Si el destino del descuento es un item, este campo mostrará el ID del item al que se le ha aplicado el descuento.
                            por: Se o alvo do desconto for um item, este campo mostrará o ID do item ao qual o desconto foi aplicado.
                        sponsorshipValues:
                          type: array
                          description: Values sponsored by either party. The sum of the amounts listed in this attribute must match the value informed in the amount atribute above.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Values sponsored by either party. The sum of the amounts listed in this attribute must match the value informed in the amount atribute above.
                            spa: Valores patrocinados por cualquiera de las partes. La suma de los montos listados en este atributo debe coincidir con el valor informado en el atributo monto anterior.
                            por: Valores patrocinados por qualquer uma das partes. A soma dos valores listados neste atributo deve corresponder ao valor informado no atributo quantidade acima.
                          items:
                            type: object
                            properties:
                              name:
                                type: string
                                example: "MARKETPLACE"
                                description: Who sponsored the discount.
                                x-description-i18n:
                                  eng: Who sponsored the discount.
                                  spa: Quién patrocinó el descuento.
                                  por: Quem patrocinou o desconto.
                                enum:
                                  - MARKETPLACE -- The Marketplace will sponsor the discount.
                                  - MERCHANT -- The Merchant will sponsor the discount.
                              amount: 
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                  value:
                                    type: number
                                    example: 119.0
                                    description: Value of the discount.
                                    x-description-i18n:
                                      eng: Value of the discount.
                                      spa: valor del descuento.
                                      por: Quem patrocinou o desconto.
                                  currency:
                                    type: string
                                    example: "ARS"
                                    description: Currency related to value.
                                    x-description-i18n:
                                      eng: Currency related to value. 
                                      spa: Moneda relacionada con el valor.
                                      por: Moeda relacionada ao valor.
                        extension:
                          type: object
                          description: Discount coupon information.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Discount coupon information. 
                            spa: Información de cupones de descuento.
                            por: Informações do cupom de desconto.
                          properties:
                            id:
                              type: string
                              example: "21515164-001"
                              description: ID of the coupon.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: ID of the coupon. 
                                spa: ID del cupón.
                                por: ID do cupom.
                            name:
                              type: string
                              example: "coupon_off"
                              description: Name of the coupon.
                              x-description-i18n:
                                eng: ID of the coupon. 
                                spa: ID del cupón.
                                por: Nome do cupom.
                  total:
                    type: object
                    description: Object that contains information about all amounts charged.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Object that contains information about all amounts charged. 
                      spa: Objeto que contiene información sobre todos los montos cobrados.
                      por: Objeto que contém informações sobre todos os valores cobrados.
                    properties:
                      itemsPrice:
                        type: object
                        description: Total price of the selected items.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Total price of the selected items. 
                          spa: Precio total de los artículos seleccionados.
                          por: Preço total dos itens selecionados.
                        properties: 
                          value: 
                            type: number
                            example: 1000.0
                            description: Total price of the selected items.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Total price of the selected items. 
                              spa: Precio total de los artículos seleccionados.
                              por: Preço total dos itens selecionados.
                          currency:
                            type: string
                            example: "ARS"
                            description: Currency related to price.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Currency related to price. 
                              spa: Moneda relacionada con el precio.
                              por: Moeda relacionada ao preço.
                      otherFees:
                        type: object
                        description: Sum of all fees.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Sum of all fees.
                          spa: Suma de todas las tarifas.
                          por: Soma de todas as taxas.
                        properties: 
                          value: 
                            type: number
                            example: 119.0
                            description: Sum of all fees.
                            x-description-i18n:
                              eng: Sum of all fees.
                              spa: Suma de todas las tarifas.
                              por: Soma de todas as taxas.
                          currency:
                            type: string

  /proximity-integration/shipments/{shipment_id}/accept:
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Accept order
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Accept order
        spa: Acceptar orden
        por: Aceitar pedido
      description: This endpoint is used to accept an order, and change its status
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: This endpoint is used to accept an order, and change its status
        spa: Este endpoint se utiliza para aceptar una orden y cambiar su status
        por: Este endpoint é utilizado para aceitar um pedido e modificar seu status
      parameters:
        - name: shipment_id
          in: path
          description: Unique ID that identifies the shipment of the order to be performed by the operation to accept an order
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Unique ID that identifies the shipment of the order to be performed by the operation to accept an order
            spa: ID único que identifica el envío del la orden a realizar por la operación para aceptar un pedido
            por: ID exclusivo que identifica o envio do pedido a ser realizado pela operação de aceitação de um pedido
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 41034141533  
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                status:
                  type: string
                  description: This property indicates the order status, which must have the value "accepted" for this endpoint
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: This property indicates the order status, which must have the value "accepted" for this endpoint
                    spa: Esta propiedad indica el status de la orden, que debe tener el valor "accepted" para este endpoint
                    por: Esta propriedade indica o status do pedido, que deve ter o valor "accepted" para este endpoint
                  example: "accepted"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  status:
                    type: string
                    description: Status of the order after its acceptance. The Status value that will be returned is "accepted"
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Status of the order after its acceptance. The Status value that will be returned is "accepted"
                      spa: Status de la orden tras su aceptación. El valor de statys que se devolverá es "accepted"
                      por: Status do pedido após sua aceitação. O valor de Status que será retornado é "accepted"
                    example: accepted   
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 400-- Conflict-error - This order cannot be accepted due to its current status.
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey: 
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - 401-- Unauthorized - Access Token is invalid 
        '403':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error

  /proximity-integration/stores/{store_id}/status:
    put:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/mp-delivery'
      summary: Update store status
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Update store status
        spa: Actualizar estado de la tienda
        por: Atualizar o status da loja
      description: This endpoint changes the operation status of a store
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: This endpoint changes the operation status of a store
        spa: Este endpoint cambia el estado de funcionamiento de una tienda
        por: Este endpoint altera o status de operação de uma loja
      parameters:
        - name: store_id
          in: path
          description: ID that identifies the store whose status will be updated.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: ID that identifies the store whose status will be updated.
            spa: ID que identifica la tienda cuyo estado se actualizará.
            por: ID que identifica a loja cujo status será atualizado.
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 4101533
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                status:
                  type: string
                  example: "enabled"
                  description: Status referring to the state of operation of the store that will be updated.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Status referring to the state of operation of the store that will be updated.
                    spa: Estado referente al estado de funcionamiento de la tienda que se actualizará.
                    por: Status referente ao estado de funcionamento da loja que será atualizada.
                  enum:
                    - disabled -- The store is disabled, and will not be shown on marketplace. It is important to bear in mind that once a store has been disabled, it cannot be enabled again. Therefore, this state should only be used to delete a store.
                    - enabled -- The store is enabled and is shown on marketplace.
                    - paused -- The delivery of store is paused, but the store will cotinue to be shown on marketplace.
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 41517088
                    description: ID that identifies the store.  
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: ID that identifies the store.
                      spa: ID que identifica la tienda.
                      por: ID que identifica a loja.
                  user_id:
                    type: number
                    example: 813887163
                    description: ID that identifies the user who owns the store.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: ID that identifies the user who owns the store.
                      spa: ID que identifica al usuario propietario de la tienda.
                      por: ID que identifica o usuário proprietário da loja.
                  description:
                    type: string
                    example: "Doc's grocery store"
                    description: Name of the store.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Name of the store.
                      spa: Nombre de la tienda.
                      por: Nome da loja.
                  status:
                    type: string
                    example: "enabled"
                    description: Status referring to the current state of operation of the store.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Status referring to the current state of operation of the store.
                      spa: Estado referente al estado actual de funcionamiento de la tienda.
                      por: Status referente ao estado atual de funcionamento da loja.
                    enum:
                      - disabled -- The store is disabled, and will not be shown on marketplace. It is important to bear in mind that once a store has been disabled, it cannot be enabled again. Therefore, this state should only be used to delete a store.
                      - enabled -- The store is enabled and is shown on marketplace.
                      - paused -- The delivery of store is paused, but the store will cotinue to be shown on marketplace.
